sentences.en: Any free radicals in Martian soil could be taken as presumptive evidence of life there.
sentences.cn: 火星土壤中的任何游离基将可用来推断火星存在生命.

sentences.en: B: this Martian shows us at least the origin of the species.
sentences.cn: 火星人乙: 这至少说明了我们的物种起源.

sentences.en: Cathy's experience of abandonment is hard for a Martian to understand.
sentences.cn: 男人难以了解卡丝被遗弃的感觉.

sentences.en: It'shows detalls of the Martian nest outside Los AngeIes.
sentences.cn: 通过它可以看出洛杉矶郊外的火星人老巢的详细情况.

sentences.en: Not only are Martian volcanoes huge, they are surprisingly complex.
sentences.cn: 火星上的火山不仅巨大, 而且出奇复杂.

sentences.en: Orson Welles managed to convince many Americans that they were being invaded by Martians.
sentences.cn: 奥森•威尔斯使得许多美国人相信他们正遭到火星人的入侵。

sentences.en: Remember, he's a Martian and doesn't keep score the way you do.
sentences.cn: 谨记, 他是火星人,记分法和你不同.

sentences.en: Scientists must now debate just where Martian water could come from.
sentences.cn: 科学家们现在要争论的是火星水从哪里来的.

sentences.en: Spectroscopic evidence for hydrous iron sulfate in the Martian soil.
sentences.cn: 在火星土壤里含水铁硫酸盐在分光镜明显.

sentences.en: The debate over the likelihood of liquid Martian water flows on.
sentences.cn: 火星上是否有液态水,目前仍争论不断.

sentences.en: The Martian atmosphere contains only tiny amounts of water.
sentences.cn: 火星的大气层中只含有极少量的水。

sentences.en: The Martian landscape is extremely varied.
sentences.cn: 火星上的景象变化极大.

sentences.en: The movie is about between the Martian and earthman's matter.
sentences.cn: 影片是关于火星人与地球人之间的事.

sentences.en: These facts mean that the Martian day and night have about the same lengths as ours.
sentences.cn: 这些事实说明,火星上的昼夜同我们的昼夜大致一样长.

sentences.en: We've rigged the epidiascope to refIect whatever the Martian Iens picks up.
sentences.cn: 我们已经准备好了幻灯机来演示火星人是怎么采集外界信息的了.

sentences.en: You can get all the Martian bIood you want after the pIane drops the bomb.
sentences.cn: 在那飞机把原子弹投下去后,你想要多少火星人的血就有多少火星人的血.

trans.tran_en: A Martian is an imaginary creature from the planet Mars
